mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course c JOIN member1 m1 ON c.userId = m1.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN chapter chp ON c.num = chp.courseNum LEFT OUTER JOIN video v ON chp.chapNum = v.chapNum
AND enabled = #{enabled, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT c.userId, userName, c.num, courseName, content, price, TO_CHAR(c.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') creg_date, c.enabled, category, chapterNum, chapterName, saveFilename, lessonName, lessonNum, TO_CHAR(v.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') vreg_date, state FROM course c JOIN member1 m1 ON c.userId=m1.userId JOIN courseCategory cc ON c.categoryNum=cc.categoryNum LEFT OUTER JOIN chapter chp ON c.num=chp.courseNum LEFT OUTER JOIN video v ON chp.chapNum=v.chapNum WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE course SET enabled=#{enabled} WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO courseState(stateNum , courseNum, stateCode, memo, registerId, sReg_date) VALUES (courseState_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{stateCode}, #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT stateNum , courseNum, stateCode, memo, registerId, sReg_date FROM courseState WHERE courseNum = #{num} ORDER BY stateNum DESC
